Moonworks:LittleGull.NAME: Little Gull
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of your turn, and every time you play a #yJonathan #yRush or #yCloud #yof #ySeagulls, deal #b2 to #b7 damage to a random enemy.

Moonworks:BrokenBomb.NAME: Broken Bomb

Moonworks:SBBomb.NAME: SB Bomb

Moonworks:GoldenDie.NAME: Golden Die
Moonworks:GoldenDie.FLAVOR: Sadly, unable to roll zeros or sevens.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the #yUses of your positive #yGift cards by #b50%.

Moonworks:Homemark.NAME: Homemark
Moonworks:Homemark.FLAVOR: It tastes like orange juice. Strange.

Moonworks:HealPanel.NAME: Heal Panel
Moonworks:HealPanel.FLAVOR: Recommended by 0 out of 1 doctors wearing lab coats. Part 1 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you generate #ymoonworks:Norma, heal #b2 HP.

Moonworks:BonusPanel.NAME: Bonus Panel
Moonworks:BonusPanel.FLAVOR: Tiny, but stars are stars. Part 3 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you generate #ymoonworks:Norma, gain #b1 energy.

Moonworks:DrawPanel.NAME: Draw Panel
Moonworks:DrawPanel.FLAVOR: Imagine only being able to hold 3 cards in your hand... Part 5 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you generate #ymoonworks:Norma, draw #b1 card.

Moonworks:DamagePanel.NAME: Damage Panel
Moonworks:DamagePanel.FLAVOR: "Ouch! What did I just step on?" Part 4 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you generate #ymoonworks:Norma, deal #b7 damage to ALL enemies.

Moonworks:HomePanel.NAME: Home Panel
Moonworks:HomePanel.FLAVOR: If you get homesick, just step on it. Part 2 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: #ymoonworks:Norma levels require #b2 less cards to achieve.

Moonworks:NeutralPanel.NAME: Tabula Rasa
Moonworks:NeutralPanel.FLAVOR: It is both empty, yet full of pure potentiality.
DESCRIPTIONS: Copies the effect of a Panel relic you own. Right click to cycle between effects.

DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove a card from your deck. Whenever you generate #yNorma, add a temporary copy of this card to your hand.

Moonworks:FleetingButterfly.NAME: Fleeting Butterfly
Moonworks:FleetingButterfly.FLAVOR: Take a picture, it'll last longer.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each combat is converted into a #ymoonworks:Memory.

Moonworks:Searchlight.NAME: Searchlight
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b2 #ymoonworks:Overheat to the healthiest enemy.

Moonworks:SpareBit.NAME: Spare Bit
Moonworks:SpareBit.FLAVOR: Not to be confused with a Sign Bit.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain #b2 #yDeploy #yBits. All #yDeploy #yBits now increase bits by #b2 when played each combat.

Moonworks:StrangePresent.NAME: Strange Present
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn #b5, apply #b4 #yVulnerable and #yWeak to ALL enemies.

Moonworks:ScorchingSun.NAME: Scorching Sun
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b1 #ymoonworks:Blasting_Light.

Moonworks:TrulyGoldenEgg.NAME: A Truly Golden Egg
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain a unique version of #yLulu's #yLucky #yEgg and #yGolden #yEgg that have stronger effects.
